name: End Of Days: Survival
description:
Will you survive the End of Days?
The modern era’s gone, and everything left is urban decay. Survivors are desperate and starving. Food, water, and hope are rare. Will you stab others in the back, or spread peace in this mad world?
Each choice counts... Choose Wisely!
The world has collapsed from an event of epic proportions. People who survived are left to fend for themselves.
Out here on the mean streets survival is rough. Old explosives. Starvation. Insanity. Fights to the death. People in the street eating dogs, cats, and each other. You’ve been in this world making it for so long, you’ve grown used to it—the panic and the terror. The putrid tang of decay on the wind is a reminder of the past you’ve long forgotten about.
It doesn’t matter what your story was. The only thing that matters is what is. Fight, tear, deceive, and skeeve through the newly destroyed civilization you thought you knew. Behind you is the past—before you is a brand new day, and another chance to survive in any way you can.
Death is your oldest companion, and only Death will follow you relentlessly as you carve out the course of your destiny in End of Days: Survival.

Features:
-The world’s most unique Card-based Death Simulator
-Play as four original characters! Or randomly try your luck.
-Try your best to survive 6 Scenarios
-Over 40 unique achievements
-Over 1000 event cards
-At least 4000 lines of text written in collusion with a horror genre hack
-Mutant Beasts
-Science Experiments
-Torture
-An inordinate amount of puns
-An archly satirical take on the Post-Apocalypse

Will you thrive? Or will you die? Find out in End of Days: Survival!

How to Play:
Tap and hold left or right on your card to see which decisions you can make at crucial story junctures. Balancing your health, safety, strength, and energy is required for making it. Consider carefully how your reactions may influence your own perception of authority, reflect on your intelligence, display your strength, fortify your health, or game your luck. The decisions you make influence your next course of action.
